data.caption: Price movement
data.news_body: Significant movement in price has been observed in Sikko Industries Limited. The Exchange, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market place so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, had written to the company. Sikko Industries Limited has submitted their response.
